text:
E.g according to the documentation the touch task uses the rather obscure formats

 MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM_or_PM

or

 MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS AM_or_PM


Standard ISO formats would be unambiguous, better to understand and memorize, e.g.

 yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss

or

 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'
creator: emergency.shower@gmail.com

text:
I completely agree it would have been better if ant would have used the ISO date/time format by default.
In order to support other date/time formats in ant 1.6.3 the "pattern" attribute was added.
The current default should not be changed, as not to break existing builds.
creator: jkf@apache.org
